page.title: 12MY FREE TIME,COTEHILL
page.content: On Monday I go to schooL.When I get back home I play on my roller boots or watch television and play on my bike and things like that.At 5.00 until 5.30 I have piano lessons.On Tuesday after schooL I play about until 6.30. Then I go to the club.At the club I meet my friends and play games and bounce on the bouncer. We play musical chairs and musical statues.We play pass the parcrel and other games.The club ends at 8.00.On Wednesday I go to gymnastics. We do head stands and cartwheels and backward rolls and handstands. Our gymnastics teacher is called Terry. On Thursdays I go to school and in the afternoon we go to music.We sing and play the recorder.When I get home I play on my bike and watch television. I used to have Scottish dancing on Thursday .
